original_title: Shiny Toy Guns - Setting Sun: Live in San Diego
overview: Alt. rockers Shiny Toy Guns perform to a sold-out crowd at the Belly Up tavern on the last stop of their 2014 summer tour. See the band performing some of their biggest hits including 'Le Disko' and 'You Are The One', along with fan favourites from their latest album 'III'.
tagline: Wave goodbye to the summer star
title: Shiny Toy Guns - Setting Sun: Live in San Diego
